name: North Wing Canggu Resort
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at North Wing Canggu Resort. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Located in Dalung, 5.7 miles from Ubung Bus Station, North Wing Canggu Resort has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Offering a bar, the property is located within 6.3 miles of Petitenget Temple. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi.

At the resort the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All rooms feature a closet.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes à la carte, continental and American options. At North Wing Canggu Resort you'll find a restaurant serving American, Chinese and French cuisine. Dairy-free and halal options can also be requested.

The area is popular for cycling, and bike rental and car rental are available at the accommodation.

Tanah Lot Temple is 7.2 miles from North Wing Canggu Resort, while Bali Museum is 7.9 miles from the property. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 11 miles away.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

name: Swan Paradise A Pramana Experience
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Swan Paradise A Pramana Experience. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Swan Paradise A Pramana Experience has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, a garden and terrace in Gianyar. This 4-star resort offers a bar. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms contain an electric tea pot, while certain rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a microwave and a minibar. At Swan Paradise A Pramana Experience all rooms have bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and American options. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving Indian, Indonesian and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested.

Tegenungan Waterfall is 3.8 miles from Swan Paradise A Pramana Experience, while Goa Gajah is 6.2 miles from the property. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 18 miles away.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.0 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Providing garden views, PINOKKIO B&B Restaurant in Ungasan features accommodations, a garden, a terrace, and a bar. There's a private entrance at the bed and breakfast for the convenience of those who stay. The bed and breakfast provides rooms with air conditioning, free private parking, and free Wifi.

At the bed and breakfast, the units include a desk. A balcony with an outdoor dining area and pool views is offered in every unit. At the bed and breakfast, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A mini-market is available at the bed and breakfast.

A car rental service is available at the bed and breakfast.

Garuda Wisnu Kencana is a 15-minute walk from PINOKKIO B&B Restaurant, while Samasta Lifestyle Village is 4.3 miles away. The nearest airport is Ngurah Rai International, 6.8 miles from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

name: Desa Swan Villas & SPA, Keramas
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Desa Swan Villas & SPA, Keramas. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Just a 2-minute walk from Selukat Beach, Desa Swan Villas & SPA, Keramas Villas offers luxurious accommodations with a private swimming pool and garden. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided.

Villas feature modern Balinese interiors and large windows overlooking the garden. All the well-appointed units are equipped with a private balcony, living area and a kitchen. A flat-screen cable TV and DVD player are included.

Indulge in a relaxing traditional body massage, or take a stroll in the garden. Car rental and day trip arrangements can be made at the tour desk.

Desa Swan Villas & SPA, Keramas Villas is a 30-minute drive from Sanur and a 40-minute drive from the lively dining and shopping areas in Ubud. Ngurah Rai International Airport is a 1.5-hour drive away.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.0 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

Offering garden views, La Royale Nusa Penida in Toyapakeh has accommodations, an outdoor swimming pool, a garden, a terrace and a restaurant.

Some of the units feature cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

An à la carte, continental or Asian breakfast is served at the property.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the lodge.

name: Aashaya Jasri Resort
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Aashaya Jasri Resort. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Located in Eastern Bali along Jalan Pantai Jasri, Aashaya Jasri Resort features a garden which ends at Jasri Beach. Rustic bungalow and villas with a private bathroom await guests.

Fishermen launch their boats at Jasri Beach, which is where guests can swim or dove in the Indian Ocean. A 15-minute drive away is Pasir Putih Beach while Amed Diving Spot is a 30-minute drive from Aashaya Jasri Resort. It takes approximately 2 hours to drive to Ngurah Rai International Airport.

Surrounded by the garden, each bungalow comes with either air-conditioning or a fan and features a terrace. A private bathroom includes a shower and toilet.

Recreation facilities include an outdoor pool and table tennis. Airport shuttle and laundry services are available at an extra charge. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in the property’s common area.

An on-site restaurant offers Indonesian and Western cuisines.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.7 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

name: Capung Asri Eco Luxury Resort with Private Pool Villas
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Capung Asri Eco Luxury Resort with Private Pool Villas. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Capung Asri Eco Luxury Resort with Private Pool Villas is a recently renovated bed and breakfast in Bedahulu where guests can make the most of its infinity pool and garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, and a shared kitchen, along with free Wifi throughout the property. There's free private parking, and the property features a paid airport shuttle service.

The bed and breakfast will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace, and a private bathroom with a bidet. A balcony with an outdoor dining area and pool views is offered in all units. At the bed and breakfast, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

À la carte and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities, and fresh pastries are available each morning at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available.

The bed and breakfast offers a variety of wellness options, including a spa facilities, a wellness packages, and yoga classes. Sightseeing tours are available close by. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Capung Asri Eco Luxury Resort with Private Pool Villas.

Goa Gajah is 2.3 miles from the accommodation, while Ubud Monkey Forest is 4.6 miles from the property. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 24 miles away.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.6 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

name: Louka Beach Bali
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Louka Beach Bali. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Located in Tianyar, 30 miles from Tegallalang Rice Terrace, Louka Beach Bali has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a private beach area. With a terrace, the property also has a bar, as well as water sports facilities. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms also offer a patio and others also have sea views. At Louka Beach Bali every room comes with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes à la carte, continental and Full English/Irish options. At the accommodation you'll find a restaurant serving French and Indonesian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

You can play pool and darts at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for snorkeling and canoeing.

Lake Batur is 12 miles from Louka Beach Bali, while Kintamani is 20 miles from the property. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 58 miles away.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.0 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

name: Menjangan Dynasty Resort
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Menjangan Dynasty Resort. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Offering an outdoor pool and views of the sea, Menjangan Dynasty Resort is located on the white sandy beach in Banyuwedang in the Bali Region. Free private parking is available on site.

Each quality tent is equipped with premium amenities and furniture. It has a flat-screen LED TV, air conditioning, mini-bar, coffee & tea making facilities, a wardrobe, and a personal safe. Guests of the tent villas enjoy an private bathroom with a bath tub and a private infinity pool.

Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and restaurant. Breakfast and afternoon tea are served daily at the Pasir Putih Beach Club, Bar & Restaurant or in your room. The restaurant serves international cuisines, snacks, and cocktails. Room service is available 24 hours.

Other facilities at this resort include Pasir Putih Spa with reflexology deck and private spa pods. There is a multi-purpose bamboo pavilion for yoga and other events. A 5-star PADI Dove Center is available on-site.

The area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Diving spots in Menjangan Island is only 30 minutes' boat trip. The resort organizes trekking, cycling, mountain biking, bird-watching, and day trip to nearby places of interest. Pemuteran is 1.9 mi  and Lovina is 25 mi from Menjangan Dynasty Resort. The nearest airport is Ngurah Rai International Airport, 93 mi from the property or a 4-hour drive through Balinese villages and scenery.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.3 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

name: Bali Cliff Glamping
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Bali Cliff Glamping. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Providing a garden, Bali Cliff Glamping features accommodations in Karangasem. This beachfront property offers access to a terrace, free private parking, and free Wifi. The luxury tent provides a pool with pool views, spa facilities, and full-day security.

Guests can take in the views of the sea from the balcony, which also has outdoor furniture. The luxury tent offers bed linen, towels, and daily room service.

À la carte and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities, and fresh pastries are available daily at the luxury tent. Guests can eat at the on-site family-friendly restaurant, which is open for dinner, lunch, brunch, and cocktails.

Guests can take advantage of yoga classes held on site. Bike rental and car rental are available at Bali Cliff Glamping, and the area is popular for snorkeling and cycling. The luxury tent also provides guests with outdoor fireplace and a picnic area for a day outdoors.

Ujung Beach is a 7-minute walk from the accommodation, while Goa Lawah Temple is 19 miles from the property. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 48 miles away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

name: Bali Beach Glamping
description:
You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Bali Beach Glamping. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.


Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.

Bali Beach Glamping features wellness packages and a fitness room, as well as air-conditioned accommodations in Tabanan, a few steps from Pig Stone Beach. This beachfront property offers access to a terrace, free private parking, and free Wifi. This 4-star luxury tent offers private entrance.

At the luxury tent, all units include a wardrobe. There's a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer, and free toiletries. At the luxury tent, units have bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, pancakes, and fruit are available for the continental breakfast. Guests are welcome to eat at the on-site restaurant, which is open for dinner, lunch, and brunch.

Guests can make the most of the garden, infinity pool, and yoga classes offered at the luxury tent. For guests with children, Bali Beach Glamping offers a children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation.

Batu Tampih Beach is a few steps from Bali Beach Glamping, while Yeh Gangga Beach is 1.3 miles away. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 17 miles from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip.Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap
